Wowhead
Wowhead

Call of Water

Speak to the Minor Manifestation of Water in Silverpine Forest.

Description

Light explodes as you finish the incantation. The sounds of the water drops hitting the flame have died down and your senses are overcome as the corrupt spirits around you are destroyed.

Completion

Thanks to you. Thanks to the shamans.

Corruption ebbs but life continues to wane. Up to shamans to protect life.

Gains

Upon completion of quests, get:
  • 0 Experience
